content:
The high representative of the EU on Foreign Affairs and Security Policy, Josep Borrel, has established Ukraine in strengthening support.

About it is in hismessageIn the social network H.

"Two years after the release of Bucha, Russia repeats massive attacks against civilian population and energy infrastructure of Ukraine to undermine the economy and stability of the Ukrainian people," Wesep Borrel wrote.

He stressed that EU's determination to defend Ukraine will only intensify.

As reported by the Armyinform, since the beginning of a large -scale invasion of the Russian UniongaveUkraine assistance for 31 billion euros.
title: EU Diplomacy Head: Two years after Bucha's release, Russia repeats massive attacks on civilian and infrastructure
